scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules  && rm -rf release-artefacts
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/nodejs/node_modules && cp -rf src/* dist/nodejs/node_modules/ && cp -rf node_modules/* dist/nodejs/node_modules/ && cd dist && zip -r canary.zip nodejs
scripts.build:alerts: cd alerts && yarn install --production --frozen-lockfile && yarn run build
scripts.build:heartbeat: cd heartbeat && yarn install --production --frozen-lockfile && yarn run build
scripts.build:slack: cd slack && yarn install --production --frozen-lockfile && yarn run build
scripts.build:all: yarn run build:canary && yarn run build:alerts && yarn run build:heartbeat && yarn run build slack
